com.storehouse.app.common.repository

Class GenericRepository<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.storehouse.app.common.repository.GenericRepository<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the generic entity class.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    OrderRepository, UserRepository

    public abstract class GenericRepository<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class of a generic repository class to interact with the database.
    Author:
    ejiafzh
